trans-unit.source: Populates <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> objects with XML schema element declarations that are found in type mapping objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用在型別對應物件中找到的 XML 結構描述項目宣告，填入 (Populate) <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> 物件中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaExporter> class provides a programmatic representation of an XML Schema Definition language (XSD) document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaExporter>類別提供的 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 文件的程式設計表示法。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaExporter> directly, use the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector> class or the [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md).
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaExporter>直接使用<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector>類別或[XML 結構描述定義工具 (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector> class creates <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> objects from classes that are identified as Web services.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector>類別會建立<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>從識別為 Web 服務類別的物件。

trans-unit.source: It uses the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaExporter> class when a Web service class specifies:
trans-unit.target: 它會使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaExporter>類別時，Web 服務類別會指定：

trans-unit.source: Literal use, indicating that the contents of SOAP message parameters and return values (or request and response documents) are literally specified with XML schema definitions.
trans-unit.target: 使用常值，表示 SOAP 訊息的參數和傳回值 （或要求和回應文件） 的內容依其字面指定使用 XML 結構描述定義。

trans-unit.source: Non-SOAP implementations of Web services using the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations.
trans-unit.target: 非 SOAP Web 服務使用的 HTTP GET 和 HTTP POST 作業的實作。

trans-unit.source: Xsd.exe generates XML schema documents from one or more types in a run-time assembly file using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaExporter> class and reflection.
trans-unit.target: Xsd.exe 產生 XML 結構描述文件從一或多個型別，在執行階段組件的檔案使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaExporter>類別 」 和 「 反映。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> objects to which element declarations obtained from type mappings are added.
trans-unit.target: 要將從型別對應取得的項目宣告加入其中的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> 物件集合。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaExporter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaExporter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaExporter> class supplies the collection of <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> objects to which XML schema element declarations are to be added.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaExporter>類別提供的集合<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>至哪一個 XML 結構描述元素宣告都是要加入的物件。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to create an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaExporter> class directly.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要建立的執行個體<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaExporter>直接類別。

trans-unit.source: Adds an element declaration for an object or type to a SOAP message or to an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將物件或型別的項目宣告加入 SOAP 訊息或 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> 物件中。

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the XML schema document to which to add an **<any>** element.
trans-unit.target: 要新增 **<any>** 項目之 XML 結構描述文件的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Exports an **<any>** element to the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> object that is identified by the specified namespace.
trans-unit.target: 將 **<any>** 項目匯出至指定命名空間所識別的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: An arbitrary name assigned to the **<any>** element declaration.
trans-unit.target: 指派給 **<any>** 項目宣告的任意名稱。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to call the method directly.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要直接呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector> creates <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> objects from classes that are identified as Web services.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector>建立<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>從識別為 Web 服務類別的物件。

trans-unit.source: A field or property of type <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>, with an attribute <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAnyElementAttribute>, is translated into an **\<any>** element.
trans-unit.target: 欄位或屬性的型別<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>，具有屬性<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAnyElementAttribute>，轉譯成**\<任何 >**項目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping" /> that contains mappings to export.
trans-unit.target: 包含要匯出之對應的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds an element declaration for an object or type to a SOAP message or to an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將物件或型別的項目宣告加入 SOAP 訊息或 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> 物件中。

trans-unit.source: The string "any" with an appended integer.
trans-unit.target: 含有附加整數的字串 "any"。

trans-unit.source: Adds an element declaration to the applicable <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> for each of the element parts of a literal SOAP message definition.
trans-unit.target: 針對常值 SOAP 訊息定義的每個項目部分，將項目宣告加入適用的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> 中。

trans-unit.source: The internal .NET Framework type mappings for the element parts of a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) message definition.
trans-unit.target: Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 訊息定義之項目部分的內部 .NET Framework 型別對應。

trans-unit.source: Adds an element declaration to the applicable <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> for each of the element parts of a literal SOAP message definition.
trans-unit.target: 針對常值 SOAP 訊息定義的每個項目部分，將項目宣告加入適用的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> 中。

trans-unit.source: For each SOAP message part, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaExporter.ExportMembersMapping%2A> method adds an XML schema element declaration to the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> that uses the same namespace as the part.
trans-unit.target: 每個 SOAP 訊息部分，<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaExporter.ExportMembersMapping%2A>方法會加入至 XML 結構描述項目宣告<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>做為部分使用相同的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: A literal message definition normally contains a single part.
trans-unit.target: 常值訊息定義通常會包含單一組件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector> class instead.
trans-unit.target: 請改用 <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector> 類別。

trans-unit.source: The internal mapping between a .NET Framework type and an XML schema element.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 型別和 XML 結構描述項目之間的內部對應。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the schema elements that enclose the schema are to be included; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要包括封入結構描述的結構描述項目，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds an element declaration to the applicable <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> for each of the element parts of a literal SOAP message definition, and specifies whether enclosing elements are included.
trans-unit.target: 針對常值 SOAP 訊息定義的每個項目部分，將項目宣告加入適用的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> 中，並指定是否包括封入項目。

trans-unit.source: Adds an element declaration for an object or type to a SOAP message or an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將物件或型別的項目宣告加入 SOAP 訊息或 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> 物件中。

trans-unit.source: Internal .NET Framework type mappings for the element parts of a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) message definition.
trans-unit.target: Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 訊息定義之項目部分的內部 .NET Framework 型別對應。

trans-unit.source: Adds an element declaration to the applicable <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> object for a single element part of a literal SOAP message definition.
trans-unit.target: 針對常值 SOAP 訊息定義的單一項目部分，將項目宣告加入適用的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> 物件中。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName" /> that represents the qualified XML name of the exported element declaration.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName" />，表示已匯出之項目宣告的限定 XML 名稱。

trans-unit.source: This overload adds an XML schema element declaration to the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> that uses the same namespace as the SOAP message part.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載加入至 XML 結構描述項目宣告<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>與 SOAP 訊息部分所使用的相同的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The literal message definition must contain a single part.
trans-unit.target: 常值訊息定義必須包含單一組件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector> class instead.
trans-unit.target: 請改用 <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector> 類別。

trans-unit.source: The internal mapping between a .NET Framework type and an XML schema element.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 型別和 XML 結構描述項目之間的內部對應。

trans-unit.source: Adds an element declaration for a .NET Framework type to the applicable <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將 .NET Framework 型別的項目宣告加入適用的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> 物件中。
